1.q_string: Let \(z\) be the set of integers. If \(A=\left\{x \in z: 2^{(x+2)\left(x^2-5 x+6\right)}=1\right\}\) and \(B=\{x \in z:-3<2 x-1<9\}\), then the number of subsets of the set \(A \times B\), is:

In a survey carried out on 1000 adults in a village, it is found that 200 speak Hindi, 300 speak English and 400 speak Urdu. It is further found that 100 speak Hindi or English, 150 speak English or Urdu, 80 speak Urdu or Hindi. It is also found that 50 speak English and Hindi and English. Then, the number of adults who speak exactly two of the three languages is:
